message: Let's split it fairly, with me getting a bit more to account for my smaller inflation rate. A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush!
Considering the higher inflation rate on my side, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. Let's settle this quickly before our money loses more value!
Okay Bob, I understand your inflation is higher. To compensate, I'm offering you $52. Let's end this now and both get a good deal before our money loses even more value!
